prodNameC: 羅氏全自動達可愛滋病毒量核酸檢驗套組第2代
prodNameE: COBAS® AmpliPrep/COBAS® TaqMan® HIV-1 Test, version 2.0
ingredientsDesc:
CAP/CTM Mn2+     1 x 19.8 mL
(CAP/CTM Manganese Solution)
< 0.5% Manganese acetate
Glacial acetic acid
0.09% Sodium azide

HIV-1 L(+)C, v2.0 	4 x 1.0 mL
(HIV-1 Low Positive Control, v2.0)
< 0.001% Armored HIV-1 RNA construct containing
HIV-1 sequences.
Negative Human Plasma
0.1% ProClin® 300 preservative

HIV-1 QS       1 x 3.6 mL
(HIV-1 Quantitation Standard)
Tris-HCl buffer
EDTA
< 0.005% Poly rA RNA (synthetic)
< 0.001% Armored HIV-1 RNA construct containing
HIV-1 primer binding sequences and a unique
probe binding region
0.05% Sodium azide

HIV-1 MMX 	1 x 2.5 mL
(HIV-1 Master Mix)
Tricine buffer
Potassium acetate
Potassium hydroxide
20% Dimethylsulfoxide
Glycerol
< 0.04% dATP, dCTP, dGTP, dUTP, dTTP
< 0.003% Upstream and downstream primers to the
gag and the LTR region of HIV-1
< 0.003% Oligonucleotide aptamer
< 0.003% Fluorescent-labeled oligonucleotide probes
specific for HIV-1 and the HIV-1 Quantitation
Standard
< 0.05% Z05 DNA Polymerase (microbial)
< 0.1% AmpErase (uracil-N-glycosylase) enzyme
(microbial)
0.09% Sodium azide

EB           1 x 7.0 mL
(Elution Buffer)
Tris-base buffer
0.2% Methylparaben

HIV-1 v2.0 CS3          1 x 48 Tests
HIV-1 Multi-Reagent Cassette containing:
Pase 
(Proteinase Solution)
Tris buffer 
< 0.05% EDTA  
Calcium chloride 
Calcium acetate 
≤7.8% Proteinase  
Glycerol	1 x 3.8 mL

HIV-1 v2.0 CS1    1 x 48 Tests
(HIV-1 Magnetic Glass Particles Reagent Cassette) 
Magnetic glass particles 
93% Isopropanol

COBAS® AmpliPrep/COBAS® TaqMan®    48 Tests
HIV-1 Test, v2.0
 (P/N: 05212294 190)

HIV-1 v2.0 CS2 	1 x 48 Tests
(HIV-1 Lysis Reagent Cassette)
Sodium citrate dehydrate 
42.5% Guanidine thiocyanate 
< 14% Polydocanol 
0.9% Dithiothreitol

CTM (–) C 	4 x 1.0 mL
[COBAS® TaqMan® Negative Control (Human Plasma)]
Negative Human Plasma
0.1% ProClin® 300 preservative

HIV-1 H(+)C, v2.0 	4 x 1.0 mL
(HIV-1 High Positive Control, v2.0)
< 0.001% Armored HIV-1 RNA construct containing
HIV-1 sequences 
Negative Human Plasma
0.1% ProClin® 300 preservative
HIV-1 v2.0 CS4      1 x 48 Tests\nHIV-1 Test-Specific Reagent Cassette containing:	\n

efficacy: 利用體外核酸增幅試驗，定量檢測人類血漿（EDTA血漿）中之第一型人類免疫缺乏病毒（HIV-1）之RNA含量。
